name: Birch Venture Capital
overview:
The Birch Venture Capital, Inc. has portfolios in California, Taiwan, Eastern China and Southern China areas.

Their investments are all in high-tech related business including semiconductors, optical displays, mobile and fixed communications, Internet services, computer software developments, green energy and environment protection technologies.

They make a win-win situation for both limited partners of strategic investors and portfolios.

Initial public offering at stock exchange market is not the only exit for the investment; they also help with merging and acquisition opportunities for portfolios.

Max Wu is founder and General Partner of the Birch Venture Capital with over 30 years of experience in the global information technology industry and the venture capital fund management. The investment professionals and financial analysis team are important resources behind the companyâ€™s success.
